name: Frozen Eye DEM SRM (Single)
customPrimary: The missile fires an ice beam at the target, dealing approximately %s fragmentation damage over the course of %s seconds. This damage is affected by missile damage modifiers and not energy weapon ones.

name: Frozen Eye SRM Pod

name: Freon Torpedo Launcher
customPrimary: A booster system accelerates the torpedo to its top speed before it leaves the launch tube.
